page.title: 07LEISURE
page.content: We play a lot of outdoor games at School -tennis,rounders,cricket,french cricket & athletics.We also swim.In the winter,we play football,hockey,netball, P.E.,badminton & volley ball.Our indoor games are Scrabble,Chess,Draughts,Cards Monopoly,Table Tennis & Snooker.In the playground,we play Marbles,Conkers, Catch,Hopscotch,Skipping & lots more. "Off Ground It" is trying to catch someone who runs but is safe when off the ground."British Bulldogs" is when there is a line of children at one end of the playground & they run to the other end past a child without getting caught.At home,we go horse riding,tri- skating,cycling,swimming,do judo,gym, have piano,trombone & trumpet lessons, sing in the Church Choir & go to Cubs & Brownies.We read,write,draw & do Projects.Our Parents play Squash,Tennis Badminton,Snooker and Keep Fit.
